spatial_accuracy.notes: Severe divergence from the provided floor plan. The central bathroom and small closet layout is entirely absent. The 3D model introduces a multi-room compartmentalized layout that does not match the open-concept kitchen/living/dining area shown in the 2D blueprint.

structural_fidelity.notes: While the roof is removed and the model is on a dark background, the internal structural walls are entirely hallucinated and do not correlate with the reference plan. The staircase is missing entirely.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement does not respect the designated zones (Kitchen, Dining, Living). Hallucinated bedrooms and office furniture are present instead of the required kitchen counters and stove.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The model successfully follows the aesthetic constraints: isometric perspective, clean low-poly style, no text labels, and soft lighting on a neutral background.

detected_errors.description: Missing staircase, kitchen counters, and specific bathroom fixtures shown in floor plan.
Inner wall layout is completely different from the source; proportions are distorted.
Major hallucinations including extra internal walls and conversion of open areas into separate bedrooms/offices.
